scripts.postinstall: cd apps/web && npx prisma generate --schema=src/lib/prisma/schema.user.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=src/lib/prisma/schema.social.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=src/lib/prisma/schema.item.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=src/lib/prisma/schema.community.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=src/lib/prisma/schema.audit.prisma
